Declare @vchSQL nvarchar(max) Declare @bigsql nvarchar(max) set @vchSQL = 'use [' + @DBName + '] IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N''[dbo].[USP_Targeting_ParentPool]'') AND type in (N''P'', N''PC'')) DROP PROCEDURE [dbo].[USP_Targeting_ParentPool] ' exec (@vchSQL)
--************************************************** --USP_Targeting_ParentPool --************************************************** Set @vchSQL ='Create Procedure [dbo].[USP_Targeting_ParentPool] @DimPoolID bigint, @DimECID bigint, @SourceLTVPassNo nvarchar(100), @ResultLTVPassNo nvarchar(100), @AutoAdjust bit, @AdjustLoopCount int
AS Set Nocount On
Declare @BalanceColumnName nvarchar(100) Declare @CriteriaTableTypeCode nvarchar(100)=''''''''
Set @BalanceColumnName = ''''FL.CurrentPrincipalBalance''''
Select @CriteriaTableTypeCode = CriteriaTableTypeCode From dbo.tblDimEC Where DimECID = @DimECId And DimPoolID = @DimPoolId
If @DimECID Is Null Begin
Select @DimECID = DimECID , @CriteriaTableTypeCode = CriteriaTableTypeCode From dbo.tblDimEC Where DimPoolID = @DimPoolID And CriteriaName = ''''ECT1_Targeting_Parent'''' And IsEnabled = 1
End
-- Parent Pool Targeting If @DimECID Is Not NULL Begin
Execute dbo.USP_Targeting_SetupConfiguration @DimPoolId, @DimECID, @BalanceColumnName, @SourceLTVPassNo, @ResultLTVPassNo
If @CriteriaTableTypeCode = ''''dbo.tblFactLoanECResult'''' Begin
Execute dbo.USP_Targeting_Parent @DimPoolId, @DimECID, @AutoAdjust, @AdjustLoopCount, @SourceLTVPassNo, @ResultLTVPassNo, @BalanceColumnName
End Else If @CriteriaTableTypeCode = ''''dbo.tblFactConsolidationECResult'''' Begin
Execute dbo.USP_Targeting_ParentConsolidation @DimPoolId, @DimECID, @AutoAdjust, @AdjustLoopCount, @SourceLTVPassNo, @ResultLTVPassNo, @BalanceColumnName End
ALTER INDEX ALL ON dbo.tblFactConsolidation REBUILD ALTER INDEX ALL ON dbo.tblFactConsolidationLoan REBUILD ALTER INDEX ALL ON dbo.tblFactConsolidationSecurity REBUILD ALTER INDEX ALL ON dbo.tblFactLoanECResult REBUILD
End ' SET @BigSQL = 'USE [' + @DBName + ']; EXEC sp_executesql N''' + @vchSQL + ''''; --PRINT @BigSQL EXEC (@BigSQL)
